Class Character

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Damagable
          Character

public class Character
extends Damagable

Inherites from its Super class Damageable. The is the Object that the user will be controlling throughout the duration of the game. The Character can move around, control the mouse, and pick up items.

Version:
V1
Author:
Matthew Holmes
